text: == Events == * February 7 - Battle of Montesarchio: Prince Pandulf IV of Benevento is killed fighting the Normans. * November 25 - Magreb brings the Tengizi islands together, and becomes the first king of the Kingdom of Tengiz. * The Liao Dynasty emperor says no to the idea of all Khitan people using surnames. == Births == * February 12 - King Conrad of Germany and Italy (d. 1101) * Edgar of Scotland (d. 1107) == Deaths == * April 25 - Hermann I, Margrave of Baden == References ==
